name: Hollywood Movie Studio
description:
Go inside The Dream Factory and run your own Hollywood Movie Studio.

Be a Hollywood Mogul
Release 100 Movies. Or 500 Movies.
Play 10 years. 20 years. 100 Years.

Hollywood Movie Studio is a text-based strategy and business simulation. This game was formerly sold as Hollywood Mogul 3. It is now a free (pay what you want) download.

This is a free PC game.

There is no Linux or Mac version.

It is possible to make a donation in-game. But if you decide to make a donation, please do it here on itch ... so they get a percentage.

I hope you enjoy Hollywood Movie Studio.

And good luck at the box office!

HMdesigner
